name: CaregivingTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This brief focuses on providing excellent care for your loved one as well as promoting a healthy lifestyle as a caregiver. This lifestyle is healthy for both and provides joy for all.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
